name: BioCo Assembly Machine_USE
description: @Poragon on the CDDA discord if you see this outside debug menu. I done goofed :c

name: BioCo Assembly Machine
description: This large mechanism is a precision assembly machine loaded with BioCo software. Capable of creating BioCo tech given the correct instructions, and must be set up prior to use.

name: BioCo AutoDoc
description: A significantly less than portable assembly of autonomous surgeon machines used for the installation of bionics. Must be set up prior to use.

name: BioCo AutoDoc Couch
description: A significantly less than portable couch loaded with sensors of all varieties, for use next to a BioCo AutoDoc unit. Must be set up prior to use.

name: BioCo_Chemical_Engine_USE
description: @Poragon on the CDDA discord if you see this outside debug menu. I done goofed :c

name: BioCo Chemical Engine
description: A BioCo manufacturing device for various chemical components and medicines. Must be set up prior to use.

name: T.K Izu Laptop
description: A modified laptop, with a BioCo transmition chip installed. These modifications allow it to communicate with BioCo's most important pre-cataclysm asset, the T.K Izu Space Station.

name: T.K Izu Close Fire Support Beacon
description: Resembling a sort of high-tech flare, this small metal rod is tuned in to T.K Izu's weaponry systems. So long as the station is in a suitable place in orbit, a close fire support mission can be requested. For security reasons, the hardware on it is designed to fail after a single use.
